website_summaries.verdict: A massive smoker with the power to feed an army and then some.
pros: Large oven features 6 adjustable cooking grates that are easy to remove for cleaning
20,000 BTUs and sealed double-door design guarantee constant temperatures no matter the weather
Powder-coated steel box can stand up to the elements for years
Electro-pulse ignition system offers quick and reliable starting
cons: Unit is large and heavy and can be difficult to assemble

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase I’ve made....was the extended warranty for this thing
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I made with this order was the square trade extended warranty. The propane regulator died on this smoker about 1.5 years ago. I was able to use it for chicken and poultry where I didn’t need low and slow cooking, but it’s finally given out completely. Usually I would be disappointed when I only get 1.5 years on a $300+ product, but this one made me irate. I’ve replaced countless regulators on hundreds of propane grills and smokers, but for some reason Dyna-Glo decided to weld or otherwise permanently attach this most vulnerable (and easiest to replace) piece on the smoker in an intentional effort to make this smoker completely disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Phr0st

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my smoker for about 2 weeks now and absolutely love it. It is an upgrade from my old smoker. I have been enjoying the extra room with this big cabinet. It looked empty with 6 whole chickens on it. The 2 burners are nice and help produce some great smoke from the old seasoned oak i have stacked which we cut chips from. Not sure i had very high expectations for this smoker but it really surprised me. I think it is 1 of the best online purchases that I have made. The cover is great quality as well. I was very happy that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Brown

customer_reviews.title: Temperature never stays on the desired level. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The good in this smoker is : big and can take lots of meet. Looks nice. Have two burners. The bad: temperature keep change and never stay on the desired temperature. The chimney looks crooked. I used it for brisket and I have to stay next to the smoker for 12 hour. I got great brisket but staying next to the smoker is not easy and if I knew that earlier I would've bought the charcoal one because it gives better smoking and also need continuous watch. I like how big and nice looking but I hate the temperature changing constantly
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: It does is advertised it is a great smoker that
customer_reviews.text: It does is advertised it is a great smoker that does a great job with all types of meats. I enjoy the fact that I don’t have to continually watch the smoker is the wood been inside your ass for hours when you do need to refill it the separate door makes it easy to pull the bin out refill it and put it right back in to the smoker not losing any of the heat through the large doors. I’ve used it for five times now and each time we have a nice smoke ring With the appropriate mount of smoke flavor. I would highly recommend it and it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Ribs so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Novice smoker but followed directions for seasoning the smoker and then used it on Memorial day! Chicken and sausage turned out great but the ribs were OUTSTANDING!! Could not be more pleased with our selection! Will be using this a lot this summer. Smoker held its temperature very nicely and the smoke was very easy to regulate. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: J. Paul

customer_reviews.title: All smoking take a little time, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than grilling. I added a digital tempter gauge with remote. & set of wheels. I added a side shelf to hold the gauge. I added a gravity level auto water fill jug. My wife loves it. Door temperature gauge is worthless. Steaks to 160 F international temperature. Turkey to 165F international temperature. For 20 minutes to kill parasites & germs
customer_reviews.author: DAVID SPONSEL

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with more racks. Great value though
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I smoke jerky semi often and this is the third smoker I currently own. Takes a little practice coming from a horizontal smoker. I put a layer of foil on the bottom rack to push the heat to the sides when smoking jerky and that’s when I realized the smoker wasn’t level because one corner nearly burnt the meat. Wish it came with more racks
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gutkowski

customer_reviews.title: Good all around smoker and fairly affordable for the size and performance.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Drip tray should be larger, as the drippings get all over the bottom past the tray on the sides and creates quite a clean up chore. I use a disposable drip tray now that fits the whole bottom so as to avoid the clean up mess. Also, burners do not have as fine of control as they need as the smoker can spike up in temperature fairly quickly with just a nudge on a dial. Drip pan tray and Smoker tray could use better rails as it can be easy to dump them if you don't pay attention when pulling them out to add water and/or wood.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Once it’s right it’s right..
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice smoker. I had to make a few adjustments to get the lower door to fit and then stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT trust the thermostat!!!
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is a very nice one. It came very well packaged. Assembly was fairly easy and straight forward. Usage is very easy, however, the temp guage is NOT accurate. My first few smoked items were a bit over done. I went and bought a digital thermometer with multiple inputs(one for smoker temp, another couple for internal meat). Found that the one that comes with the smoker is 50 - 100° lower than the actual temp! After that, all my smoked products have turned out mouth watering!
customer_reviews.author: Trish Laporta

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: The temperature control is real easy to regulate. Was able to maintain a temperature between 200 and 225 with ease. Turned out tremendous ribs and smoked brats. Easy to assemble, just take your time and read the directions. It is a big heavy cooker, but if you remove shelves and doors, one person can move it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: keeps a steady temp easy to use and heavy ...as in weight LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: love this smoker , only thin I would change is to insulate it due to the cold temps we have here in the MIGHT MITTEN ..I ve done it all in this oven it holds temps as it is and is easy to use I have no bad comments on it period!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Room/Easy to Operate
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to arrive. Took awhile to assemble. Has lots of room and lots of rack space. Temperature is consistent once you get it dialed in. Door thermometer is accurate +/- 2°
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very nice smoker
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a smoker similar to my old one however this one is a bit larger. I wasn't sure about the size but now that I have the larger one it is perfect. I have already smoked a lot of meat in it and works better than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Marsh

customer_reviews.title: temperature control and door seal. Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Beat smoker thus far that we have owned. Shelves are wide enough to put full racks of ribs without cutting in half before smoking. This weekend we are doing 8 st Louis racks for a party and I know it will come out perfect with no worries and atreaa
customer_reviews.author: Donna Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: A Great Smoker with Plenty of Room
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smoker and I'm very pleased with the performance. Customer service was excellent. There was damage to one of the hinge receivers on the smoker body. Customer service was contacted and it was a very smooth process and they send out a new body. Excellent customer service. The performance of the smoker has been excellent!
customer_reviews.author: David r.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for a novice or an expert - with a little practice adjusting venting and profane flow - anyone can become a master smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Yasser

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this smoker to my daughter for a bday gift and she loves it. The price was just OKAY. Home depot had the same price. The smoker is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: jogee

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: we love it,it does what you expect it to do
customer_reviews.author: Costello

customer_reviews.title: Love this smoker !
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this for himself. He LOVES to smoke meat ! We had the smaller version but he decided to go big ! He uses a multi probe thermometer to monitor temperature in the meat, top of smoker, bottom of smoker and this smoker is amazing ! Even heat , we can feed an army. You will really love this if you get one !
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: ... used the smoker a few times now and really like it, other than the location of the water ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used the smoker a few times now and really like it, other than the location of the water pan but this is a very minor "drawback". Last time I used the smoker I did a 22lb and a 15lb turkey, on the same rack with plenty of room to spare for other items.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Extrawide smoker
customer_reviews.text: I smoked a 22 pound brisket a 10 pound pork butt 27 pounds of beef cheek meat and 2 cow Tongue in the smoker all at once was a very good investment and gave it to my nephew for us for smoker
customer_reviews.author: Clarence W.

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite cooking device hands down
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite cooking device hands down! we will be enjoying this smoker for years to come! Easy to operate and tons of room!
customer_reviews.author: april dawn

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product, too bad it arrived damaged. Dented in side, doors won't close, and top is dented/damaged. We'll see if the manufacturer warranty is any good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Smoker at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to smoking and was looking for a propane smoker that would allow me to get started with room to expand. This smoker has a ton of space to fit plenty of food to feed a large group. We’ve already used it twice to make smoked chicken and smoked Mac and cheese. My only complaint is that one of the side vents isn’t tight enough to get a good seal. This can cause some issues in heat regulation.
customer_reviews.author: Funk Schwoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker
customer_reviews.text: I wish that there would have been better size dimensions in the description. Height and width are ok, wish it was a little deeper. It was easy to assemble and has some nice features.
customer_reviews.author: Ribmeister1

customer_reviews.title: no hardware to assemble
customer_reviews.text: the unit came with no instructions or hardware. bought it for a father day gift and now the 'expedited' delivery on the hardware is 5-7days so no i get to say that we bought this for you buy you cant have it for at least a week. buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad A$$ smoker!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thing for deer camp, assembled it the first night and seasoned it. Never turned it off again for 72 hours, cooking for a large group. Amazing product for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions listed are the with and depth of the feet. Actual smoking cabinet is much smaller. 23"x14" Very disappointed in how small smoker actually is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: Very good, consistent heat, no leaks and does a great job
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Sierra

customer_reviews.title: ... have smoked several times on it it is a great
customer_reviews.text: Built very well and works well no problems I converted to natural gas and have smoked several times on it it is a great smoker
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A Prater

customer_reviews.title: Good propane smoker.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, pretty easy to assemble. It takes a few times to get used to and monitoring the temp. Overall we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sid Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Smoker
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this smoker--- I'm using it for my home raised meat--- you fill up the liquid bowl & the wood chips, no need to refill, good for up to 8 hours. Love it!!! much better than my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must if you have parties.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smoker or even just a slow cooker. Will make a great warming oven for my next party too, with all the racks to put the warming trays on.
customer_reviews.author: Craig vanderbeck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and product worked as it should. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Efrem Hill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great machine easy to control heat with 2 burners smoked 4 hams for Christmas party
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G. Haines

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware and instructions
customer_reviews.text: Missing hardware and instructions I had to rebox and return.
customer_reviews.author: jbon

customer_reviews.title: Great but damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: We received this very quickly and it looks great, unfortunately it was damaged during shipping and the seal on the back at the bottom is broken so I am sure it won't smoke correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker
customer_reviews.text: The smoker is a nice size. Haven't got to use it yet but anxious to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker. Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker. Working great so far. Only issue is the starter doesn't work so just stuck using a grill lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Martinsen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented like most other reviews say
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented like most other reviews say, but looks like will smoke well. Construction is good for the price

customer_reviews.title: but everything else looks good will have to try it after seasoning this weekend
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and a weld was done poorly on the lower door bracket going to have to re weld it myself makes it a hassle, but everything else looks good will have to try it after seasoning this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Krump

customer_reviews.title: Mine arrived with dents in both doors and I may have kept it as dents were not too bad but cheap burners in this huge cabinet wi
customer_reviews.text: .....DOES NOT HAVE CAST IRON BURNERS..... They are made of very thin metal and coated with paint or something... Mine arrived with dents in both doors and I may have kept it as dents were not too bad but cheap burners in this huge cabinet will require some big BTUs I would suggest the next size down unless you need more room for smoking something like jerky or sausage..
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Kleso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smoker, easy to assemble and was able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Smoker, easy to assemble and was able to fit 8, 6 to10lb, Boston butts and smoked them wonderfully I would buy again!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very consistent
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s huge, and we smoked 8 racks of ribs, two huge briskets, two pork loins, and 9 sausage links to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: ... is spectacular they replaced a couple parts that were bad without hesitation and smoker works
customer_reviews.text: customer service is spectacular they replaced a couple parts that were bad without hesitation and smoker works fantastic
customer_reviews.author: michael d.

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived in perfect condition, took 30 minutes to assemble and look ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in perfect condition , took 30 minutes to assemble and look great .
customer_reviews.author: Leann Courage

customer_reviews.title: Dyna-Glo  43" wide body gas smoker
customer_reviews.text: purchased item Dec.2015 for summer of 2016. The top latch wasn't latching properly. used item twice, third time the latch on the top door broke. How can I get replacement latches ?? otherwise a superp smoker for a beginner. Love It !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juanuna

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst ever. Item arrived with dented doors from Dyna-Glo. No way to hold seal. Dyna-Glo failed to include hardware to assemble. Also no instructions from Dyna-Glo in box. Product seems ok if undamaged and all parts available. Amazon only full of excuses on replacement. Waiting to see see replacement. Next step will be with Dyna-Glo.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman A. Moss

product_meta.title: Dyna-Glo DGW1904BDP-D 43" Wide Body LP Gas Smoker
product_meta.description: This easy-to-use, LP gas vertical smoker, is the perfect solution for year-round backyard cooking. It all starts with a push button, electronic ignition that emits a rapid pulse for quick and easy lighting. The dual cast iron burners provide 20,000 total BTUs for reliable cooking performance in cold or warm weather. The pre-installed door seals help retain heat and minimize smoke loss for improved cooking efficiency. 6 height adjustable cooking grates provide 1,904 total square inches of cooking space. Each grate can be adjusted to accommodate whatever size and type of food your heart desires. Pre-installed sausage hooks and removable rib rack provide additional cooking flexibility. The large capacity water bowl and wood chip box are made with heavy gauge, porcelain enameled steel for hours of maintenance free cooking. The temperature gauge features a "smoke zone" which indicates the ideal temperatures for infusing smoke flavor. Dyna-Glo 43 inch Wide Body LP Gas Smoker offer quality, performance, and versatility. The smoker has 1,904 total cooking space over 4 adjustable cooking grates. This cooking space is heated by 2 burners that provide 20,000 BTUs of cooking power. Pre-installed upper and lower door seals help to minimize heat and smoke loss. The smoker also offers versatility with pre-installed sausage hooks and removable chrome plated rib racks to give you a variety of cooking options. A stainless temperature gauge with a smoke-zone indicator to achieve the optimum temperature to seal in that smoker flavor.
feature_bullets: 20,000 Total BTUs, Dual Cast Iron Burners
TOTAL 1,235 square Inch of cooking space
Protect your smoker with a custom-fit Dyna-Glo premium cover - Model DG1904GSC (Sold Separately)
Firebox material and finish: Steel, powder Coated

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars109 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
